sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { AlertTriangle, TrendingUp, Users, DollarSign } from 'lucide-react'; const FraudMetrics = ({ data }) => { if (!data) return null; const suspiciousNodes = data.nodes.filter(node => node.suspicious); const totalTransactionValue = data.links.reduce((sum, link) => sum + link.value, 0); return (
{suspiciousNodes.slice(0, 5).map((node, index) => (

Node {node.id}

PPR Score: {(node.ppr * 100).toFixed(1)}%

{node.transactions} transactions

High risk

))}

{suspiciousNodes.length}

Suspicious Nodes

${(totalTransactionValue / 1000).toFixed(1)}K

Total Volume

); }; export default FraudMetrics;
